Самая легендарная игра всем времён и народов!
I am playing it like 12 years after it was released and it is stilll a amazing game

hl1 was better

-main enemies in hl2 are combine, they have good squad ai but they have hitscan weps and are more boring than hl1's wide variety of enemies
-hl1 always kept you on your toes, very few resting spots, it had little dialogue yet conveyed an awesome story. hl2 has an entire chapter called "black mesa east" that is 100% dialogue and a grav gun tutorial. 
-hl1 has better story, and the "broken down industrial facility" atmosphere makes it feel more immersive
-hl2 has doesnt even connect to hl1, totally different story line. Hl1 was escaping from black mesa and going into another dimension, hl2 is about overthrowing space nazis

only thing i like more in hl2 are the mods, and the engine

Você não precisa de feedbacks para comprar a franquia Half Life. O jogo é simplesmente um dos melhores jogos já criados!

Half Life 2 é exatamente aquilo que os jogadores querem. Uma continuação da história totalmente plausível, com uma jogabilidade muito bem melhorada e gráficos espetaculares. 
A história em si é uma obra à parte. O jogo de forma maestral, te conta os eventos desde o prólogo até o final dentro do próprio jogo (claro, algumas coisinhas realmente tem que serem vistas antes de começar). E Half Life 2 não é diferente.
A jogabilidade é MUITO boa, com recursos novos em relação ao HL1 e obviamente com armas novas. Ah, mas o velho "pé de cabra" de sempre.
O mecanismo de tiro da franquia Half Life não segue os FPS + modernos (BF, COD e etc). 90% das vezes você realmente mira no inimigo e o projétil não o acerta (em média/longa distância), mas é totalmente irrelevante diante dos altos e intensos confrontos "corpo a corpo".
A dublagem é excelente, gráficos que até hoje são inegávelmente um dos melhores.

Franquia Half Life mudou para sempre e inovou o jeito dos jogadores jogarem FPS, co-op e o sistema "WASD". 
Merece nossos aplausos e reverências pelo extraordinário trabalho que a Valve fez com este jogo, inclusive com o Half life 1.

Como eu já disse, você não precisa motivos para comprar esse jogo, Half Life é quesito OBRIGATÓRIO na biblioteca de jogos. São lendas como Half Life que merece aquele canto separado especialmente para ele.

São jogos como Half Life, Bioshock, Soma...... Que faz a história do jogo te envolver, emocionar, indignar, enfim.. inúmeros sentimentos e emoções que só os melhores jogos com as melhores histórias, enredo e harmonia podem proporcionar.

Про эту игру давно уже все сказано, но все же постараюсь удивит тех, кто с этим шедевром ещё не знаком.
Хочется сразу отметить ассоциацию себя с главным героем. Гордон молчалив, и поэтому мы сами можем построить возможные фразы которые он так и не сказал. Так же очень сильно чувствуется атмосфера-когда вы только прибыли в сити-17 вы ничего не знаете и не понимаете что вообще происходит- как и мистер Фримен вы словно едва вышли из анабиоза.
Графика радует глаз, она едва ли не лучше чем в black ops 3, детальнее рассматривать не вижу смысла.Шутерная механика с первой части не сильно изменилась, все понятно с первого уровня, ничего сверхъестественного.
Очень радует смена декораций- из антиутопического города- в довольно страшный рейвенхольм. Бегать к белому другу впринципе не придётся, но уровень жутковат.
Сюжет.
Подаётся как и раньше без кат сцен, все в геймплее - можете как безумный прыгать вокруг персонажей, пока те решают судьбу мира.
Диалоги без лишнего пафоса, действительно словно сказаны живыми людьми.
К персонажам сильно привязываешься, начинаешь переживать почти сразу после знакомства.
Вообщем, всем кто эту игру пропустил настоятельно рекомендую купить и ознакомиться желательно вместе с дополнениями.
Ждём третью часть!!
游戏非常棒，但那3D眩晕症是真的!怎么回事啊！

Good story line. Good action. Hard, but not too hard. Good game. But, like alll games since Half Life 1, nothing compares. Playing Half Life 1 set the standard by which all other games are judged. So, until we get another game up to the standard of Half Life 1, nothing else will do.

Este tipo de juegos me encantan.
La historia no es profunda ni te hará reflexionar sobre la vida, pero es entretenida y te mantiene interesado por ella, el juego te sorprende con mecánicas nuevas, enemigos, escenarios, situaciones, personajes, vehículos, y armas constantemente y se acaba haciendo muy entretenido.

En definitiva, es un juego bien hecho y bien realizado y muy entretenido, aunque eso si el doblaje es una caquita

God

I have selective tastes. I have difficulty selecting my favorite games of all time because I am so critical of every game. My current list is:
#1  Super Metroid and The Legend of Zelda: The Windwaker
#2  To the Moon and Half-Life 2
I really put games at the same level often, seeing as I put games together in quality a lot.

Onto the review.

GRAPHICS: Holy fuck. Holy FUCK. HOLY FUCK. This game's graphics are the best graphics for the time it came out. This game came out in 2004. 2004. This game's graphics are comparable to the graphics of 2011. This blows my mind. It is ambient, accurate, and surprisingly easy on computers. Even on my shitty PC I was getting constant 100-120 fps. 100/100.

AUDIO: Ambient, intense, awesome, and high quality in general. 100/100.

GAMEPLAY: Imagine the best aspects of PC gaming. Mulitply the satisfaction of those by x100. This game is fluid in controls, simple and easy to learn and use, and makes complete sense. 100/100.

STORY: Makes all the sense and none of the sense in the world. Perfect combo of understandable and open for interpretation. 100/100.

ATMOSPHERE: You really feel a sense of dread and apocolypse in City 17. There is a scene where this especially scene when you enter a room, and you find a couple of resistance members crying and comforting eachother through the entire scenario. This game gives you the feeling that you are doing good for everyone. 100/100.

GENERAL: It is just good. It is amazing. It is the most incredible PC game I have ever played. I guarentee that you will feel the same. 100/100.

. Un argumento muy bien llevado que no requiere de cinemáticas, o interferencias demasiado sonantes con respecto a la interactividad del juego, y personajes carismáticos y bien definidos.









PD: Este análisis se desarrolló en tres puntos, coincidencia, no lo creo.

Klasyk. I tyle. 10/10

Игра-оверхайп. И дело не в том, что это плохая игра: здесь есть неплохой сюжет и персонажи, заигрывания с физикой и своя оригинальная вселенная - проблема HL2 в том, что даже в том далёком 2004 году было много игр, в которых есть то же самое, но интересней. Стрелять куда приятней в Far Cry и Painkiller, ползать по канализациям в качестве Риддика, а за мрачной атмосферой -  Doom 3, поэтому я искренне не понимаю людей, которые ждут третью часть.

Итог: игра, которую стоит купить либо из уважения к серии, либо если вообще с ней не знакомы. Если хочется чего-то интересного - в 2004м было много куда более захватывающих игр.

P.S. Сразу скажу, что это взгляд на игру сегодняшнего дня. Проходил ее на момент выхода, и тогда она производила впечатление, но сейчас, увы, неактуальна.

Half-Life 2, the game that like it's predecessor is seen as a classic. It's time for me to find out if the game still holds up. 

The story takes place some years after the events of the original Half-Life. Gordon Freeman is woken up by G-Man to find out that the world had been taken by the alien Combine. Gordon is then joined by resistance fighters to find a way to free humanity. 

The gameplay itself is a mixture of shooting, puzzle solving and exploration much like the first Half-Life game. However, all of this is differently executed in Half-Life 2. In Half-Life 2 everything is even more dynamic, because of objects being destructible and having physics, which can result in some memorable chain reactions. 

The world felt to me like a real open world game, while it is still a pretty linear game. This has to do with the fact that you are mostly outside and you can explore the different areas and interact with npcs. The world you play in is around the same city area, which means that this time you aren't going to other alien dimensions. 

When you think about it there aren't actually that many new things in Half-Life 2. But the things that are new still deliver new gameplay. For instance, the gravity gun that you get can grab and shoot objects which is great for murdering and puzzle solving. The gravity gun really adds a playfulness to the game. The other real new weapon is the bug bait which is a ball that you can throw on enemies or destinations, which will result in a group of your own aliens going to it and attacking the enemies. The only problem I had with this is that you can only use this weapon in a certain section.  

The other new gameplay feature is that you can now drive a buggy at certain parts. I read people saying that it was the worst part of Half-Life 2. In my opinion even though the buggy feels clunky I loved that part the most. It really gives that open world explorer feeling, because of you have to get out of the vehicle to look around. 

The sounddesign in this game was also done by the same team as the one that worked on the original Half-Life. I can say that I liked this soundtrack even more than the previous one, because of it having more of its’ own style. The epic music sometimes felt a little off though, but they are still fun to listen to. The sound effects add a quirky feeling, and the voice acting is also professionaly executed. 

The storytelling of the game was mostly well executed, with also including storytelling through gameplay. Sadly, unlike in its’ predecessor, you are forced at certain parts to listen to conversations. This can be pretty annoying if you have to listen to it again, without the option to skip it. 

I have to say that overall the world, story and gameplay doesn't feel as flawlesly connected as it was in the previous Half-Life. That probably has to do with the fact that the game also wanted to show everything impressive that the engine could do. 

The game took me 12 hours to complete so it was shorter than the original Half-Life, but I guess that also has to do with the fact that at the beginning I unknowingly played on the easiest difficulty. Later I found out I could actually change it in the options menu. 

Even with the complaints I have with Half-Life 2 compared to Half-Life 1, I can still recommend it. The game like its’ predecessor was greatly ahead of its’ time, and at some parts maybe still is. While playing I realized that every futuristic game that I played that came out after Half-Life 2 all had big 'inspiration' from the game.  Half-Life 2 is still adventurous enough that it still holds up.

(English)
Half-Life 2, it's not just a game, it's a masterpiece....

Half-Life 2, the atmosphere apocalyptic, abandonment, totalitarianism and dystopia, mixed in different proportions to obtain the desired effect.

Half-Life 2, this is a world where people are no longer the kings of their home world and forced to share him with alien creatures and monsters from other worlds and dimensions. Some aliens helping hand in the fight against the powerful Alliance that has seized the Land, while others continually strive to try human flesh tastes like.

Half-Life 2, this diversity of gameplay. Now we're just looking around in the city, along the way asking questions plan “What's going on?” and “How does humanity come to this?”. Then we run through the sewers to escape the police. Then roll on a canal boat, simultaneously firing all the living and mechanical-flying that tries to stand in our way. Then the game turns into a Survival-Horror with shooting zombies in a Ghost town when your allies become a mad priest and a trusty shotgun. After that, we will drive the buggy on the desert coast, in company with insect age, trying to eat the main character for lunch. And at the end of all adventures, we will have a revolution and war against the invaders. 

Half-Life 2, is the abundance of enemies and the representatives of different alien races. Insects overgrown crowd Bouncing for the player should he step on the sand. A giant synthetic, one gulp crumbling building. Marines of the Alliance, which recognized the people of yesterday, and now it is the soldiers without feelings and emotions. Headcrabs – creatures-parasites that make people zombies. The allies of humanity in the face of the Vortigaunts. In General, the imagination of developers do not know borders...

In Half-Life 2 is not something recurring, we are constantly surprised by something new. Skirmishes with opponents are diluted with puzzles with the use of basic knowledge of physics, Hiking in confined spaces at times are replaced by the adrenaline of the race along the coast or sunken channels, and then throw us to the streets of a bombed city 17 straight to the enemy loopholes. Characters appear and disappear, and not having time to clarify the complete picture of the events occurring in the world. 

(Русский)
Half-Life 2, это не просто игра, это шедевр….

Half-Life 2, это атмосфера апокалиптики, заброшенности, тоталитаризма и антиутопии, смешанные в разных пропорциях для получения должного эффекта.

Half-Life 2, это мир, где люди больше не цари своего родного мира и вынуждены делить его с инопланетными существами и чудовищами с других миров и измерений. Одни пришельцы протягивают руку помощи в борьбе с могущественным Альянсом, захватившим Землю, а другие то и дело норовят попробовать человечину на вкус.

Half-Life 2, это многообразие геймплея. Сейчас мы просто осматриваемся в городе, попутно задаваясь вопросами плана “Что вообще происходит?” и “Как человечество до такого дошло?”. Затем мы бежим по коллекторам, спасаясь от полиции. Затем катимся по каналам на лодке, попутно отстреливая всё живое и механическое-летающее, что пытается встать на нашем пути. Затем игра превращается в Survival-Horror с отстрелом зомби в городе-призраке, когда твоими союзниками становиться лишь безумный священник и верный дробовик. После этого, нас ждёт поездка на багги по пустынному побережью, в компании с насекомыми-переростками, норовящие съесть главного героя на обед. А под конец всех похождений, нас ожидает революция и война против оккупантов. 

Half-Life 2, это обилие врагов и представителей разных инопланетных рас. Насекомые переростки толпой прыгающие на игрока стоит ему наступить на песок. Гигантские синтеты, одним залпом рушащие здания. Пехотинцы Альянса, в которых узнаются вчерашние люди, а ныне это солдаты без чувств и эмоций. Хедкрабы – существа-паразиты, делающие из людей зомби. Союзники человечества в лице Вортигонтов. В общем, фантазия разработчиков границ не ведала…

В Half-Life 2 нет чего-то повторяющегося, нас постоянно удивляют чем-то новым. Перестрелки с противниками разбавляются головоломками с применением элементарных знаний физики, пешие прогулки в замкнутых пространствах временами заменяются на адреналиновые гонки по побережью или затопленным каналам, а затем нас бросают на улицы разбомбленного Сити-17 прямиком на вражеские амбразуры. Персонажи появляются и исчезают, так и не успевая прояснить игроку полную картину событий произошедших в мире. Скажу только одно игра супер советую!

I didnt expect this game to be as good as it was considering how old of a game it is. This game is awesome and it really captivates you throughout the story. the physics in the game are amazing and while i was playing i was wondering why new games dont have physics like this. overall its a great game worth the price.

Half-Life 2 is a Singleplayer game which makes a typical alien invasion story turn into a reality. I loved the singleplayer aspect and simple puzzles that which built up Half-Life 2 and it's Episodes, oh yeah and there episodes, this is the first game in the franchise. Anyway even if you don't own the first Half-Life game you will still enjoy it for what it has. 

Okay enough with the written review here is a list of pros and cons.

Pros: Very Decent Weapon Balancing, Supports mods, Good characters and how they are presented, Best level designs and dynamics, Hard mode is HARD MODE, heavy replayability especially with Garry's Mod.

Cons: AI Is stupid at Easy, Needs remaster (But the Cinematic Mod and the Community lighting mod help this), Needs HL3.

When you buy this you will not regret it, even if it does use old BSP map files.. :D

Its like the first Half-Life, but its the second one! Its an action packed, fast paced, science fiction, first person shooter! With trains!

This game was definitely revolutionary for it's time. However, since I played it about 10 years after it came out, ironically it feels a little dated and generic. It's still a really solid single-player 'old-school' FPS, and my only stand-out gripe is that levels tend to drag on, and since this game focuses more on story than the first, it throws off the pacing a bit.

Would still recommend if you have the extra cash.

Игра-легенда. Самое лучшее дитя Valve - Half-Live 2. Первый раз пройдя эту игру, я не мог нарадоватся её восхищением. Он была, та что была, она и есть прекрасной и вполне может даже конкурировать с современными играми, которые лишь жалкие пародии подобного жанра. Весьма благодарен Valve за эту игру, здесь можно получить всё: отличные эмоции от сюжена, приятные ощущения от графики и наслаждатся музыкальным сопровождением.
Очень рекомендую эту игру к многократному прохождению. Не пожалеете.
10 хэдкрабов из 10.
Отличная игра, всем советую поиграть.

Почему шедевр, спросите вы?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Многие сейчас пишут, что в сегодняшние дни называть Half-Life 2 проектом колоссального уровня – это проявлять «инерционные» чувства ностальгии о былых временах. Я поспешу категорически с этим не согласиться. Создать игру-революцию во второй раз, причем революцию по многим аспектам, будь то графика, физика, сюжет, геймплей и игровая вселенная в целом – это не шутки шутить. Реализовать проект, о котором будут говорить спустя десятилетия, который будет вызывать множество жарких полемик и сохранять дух таинственности и намеренной недосказанности, для которого по сей день будут клепаться фанатские моды и аддоны – это ли не признак шедевральности? По мне, так большего и не нужно, чтобы уяснить для себя, что именно представляет из себя вторая часть приключений Гордона Фримена, и почему мы до сих пор не увидели полноценной третьей части

[b] "By taking the suspense, challenge and visceral charge of the original, and adding startling new realism and responsiveness, Half-Life 2 opens the door to a world where the player's presence affects everything around him, from the physical environment to the behaviors even the emotions of both friends and enemies." [/b]

[h1] Story [/h1]

[b] Half-Life 2 is the direct sequel to the award-winning original, Half-Life, released on Nov. 16, 2004. The story continues the adventures of past-Black Mesa researcher and scientist, Gordon Freeman. After being put in stasis by G-Man after the Black Mesa incident, Gordon is sent out again almost 20 years after the event, greeted by the barren, desolate, and oppressed world that is planet Earth. The event that was the Resonance Cascade, which opened up a portal from Xen to Earth, allowed the creatures from Xen to flood in, killing scientists and marines alike. The aliens of Xen were followed by a greater, even more powerful race, called the Combine, who started and ended the Seven-Hour war, declaring the creatures of Xen and humans of Earth as their own. They took control of the Earth, and started funnleing out a never-ending stream of soldiers, who beat down and controlled the human populace. When Gordon steps out of stasis, he joins the Resistance, a human and alien force who constantly battle the Combine to once again free the Earth. [/b]

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

[b] Half-Life 2's Gameplay is centered around the use of weapons in combat, as in the original. Yet, as not seen before, you are now given the oppurtunity to explore your surrondings completely, finding tucked-away areas and hide-aways brimming with secrets and discoveries. The game is set in a first-person view, with your character, Gordon Freeman, not talking or reacting to the enviroment in any verbal way. This gives You, the player, complete immersion and focus, letting you feel, see, think, and do exactly how you want and the way you want. Valve, the creators of the Half-Life series, have created one of the best realistic-physics engine to date, the Source engine. This means that any and all items, vehicles, furniture, materials, weapons, creatures and people will react to the enviroment realistically, such as weight, visibility, health, and more. There are many weapons to use, such as the SMG, Rocket Launcher, and brand-new Gravity Gun. The Gravity Gun can pick up objects in the game, even the heavier ones like barrels and dressers. You can use the Gravity Gun to pick up objects out of the way, punt them great distances, and use them as blunt weapons when thrown. And, yes, the crowbar is back, which can be used for breaking obstacles and killing enemies. [/b]

[h1] Graphics [/h1]

[b] The Graphics of Half-Life 2 are made by Valve's game engine, Source. With this, the enviroment can look fresher then ever, with swaying grass and rope, white clouds and bright suns, and shiny, polished floors, and rough, cut wood. The graphics of Half-Life 2 are not, in any way, a showcase of today's games, but do feel surprsingly realistic and crisp, and look quite good even after all these years. [/b]

[h1] Overview [/h1]

[b] Half-Life 2 is a masterpiece of a game, winning over 39 Game of the Year awards, among others, and is widely considered to be the best game of all time. The characters are unique and quirky, like rebelious Alex, nervous Dr. Kleiner, and confident Eli. The enviroments range from city streets, to zombie-infested rooftops, to a Combine-controlled prsion. Weapons are powerful but require precision and focus, battles are challenging but have to be examined and tactically played, and the enviroment is breath-taking but deadly and dangerous. This is the kind of game every person should play at least once, from indie-game casuals to multiplayer tryhards. So, put on your H.E.V. suit, grab your trusty crowbar, and become The One Free Man.  [/b]

Half life 2 is a epic sequel to an epic game. This time there are actual characters than generic models.Theres Barney Calhoun from Blue Shift,who was a security guard at Black Mesa,theres Issac Kleiner who like Gordon was a scientist at Black Mesa. There is Alyx Vance who is the daughter of another scientist at Black Mesa named Eli Vance,it seems like everyone is from Black Mesa,there is Dr Breen who was the administrator of Black Mesa,Judith Mossman who was competing against Gordon to get a position at Black Mesa,Gman who is mysterious and stares at you in anyway possible.There is a monk who you meet in the town Ravenholm called Father Grigori who is the only known survivor there and he escorts you to the mines and there is Odessa Cubbage who is the leader of the ressistance bace called Little Odessa. I do prefer the beta of the game with the Borealis and Air Exchange but this game is still charming. I rate 11/10

Serve davvero recensire questo capolavoro? Puntualmente, ogni 1-2 anni mi ritrovo a giocare Half Life 2 senza mai stancarmi. La semplicità e il coinvolgimento della storia sono i suoi punti di forza. Ormai è quasi impossibile trovare uno sparatutto con pochi fronzoli, un set limitato di armi che non richieda giornate intere per capirle e pochi comandi da memorizzare. Sarà che io in un gioco cerco un po' di rilassamento mentale, e non un qualcosa che mi innervosisca. E per me Half Life 2 è il massimo da questo punto di vista.
